main event: A rectangular object with a white center and red and green sides was observed in Saginaw, Michigan on August 3, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared sometimes stationary and was reported to have no sound., The object has been observed previously in the same area after 2300 hours., The observation was made using binoculars., The sighting coordinates were at azimuth 290 degrees and elevation 15 degrees., There was a consideration that the sighting could have been a weather balloon, but results were negative.
sighted object: rectangular object with a white center and red and green sides
